channel.title: The2006project Development Team!
channel.description:
Hey guys im starting a 2006 server called the2006project but i need some people who could help me code the server. Heres the server post that i made in the server advertisment
Today ive decided people are looking for 2006 rsps servers than why not make one! Im in need of developers if you would like to be a developer please leave a comment below. There will be some updates adding in items that arent in 2006 Don't worry these will not get out as they are only for staff members. If you do not like the updates post a comment and i will remove them! Thanks -Clayton [b][center][size=12pt][url=http://www.the2006project.webs.com]The2006Projec[/url]t[/size][/center] [b][center]Staff[/center] Hello guys this is the staff list. I will be doing this as a under cover project so my orignal staff will not be on board here! Main Owner=Mod Clayton Thats all as i said earlier im soloing this project but also as i said earlier im in need of a developer! [center][b]Project Plans[/b][/center] [*]Auto Cache Downloader [*]Webclient [*]Prices [*]Custom Shops [b][center][SIZE=14pt]Custom's[/SIZE][/center] We will be adding some custom weapons,items and shields into the game. WE WILL NEVER UPDATE THE CLIENT LOOKS OR GRAPHICS! If you do not like any of the stuff we are updating please leave a comment saying so or i will never know! Weapons [*]Chaotic Rapier (Fun Weapon) [*]Dice Bags [size=10pt]Cosmetic items[/size] [*]Sky Blue Party Hat [*]Neon Party Hat [*]Rainbow Party Hat [*]Purple H'ween Mask [size=10pt]Shields[/size] Most of this will be for Staff members only so don't worry about this. [*]Spirit Shields (Admins) [*]Chaotic,farseer and eagle-eye shields (Owners) [*]Bandos Kiteshield (Donator +) [*] [b][center][size=14pt]Developer Needed![/size][/center] This is a big project but i can't do it on my own i need your guys help. Im in need of a developer who can partner with me and get this server running for the rest of our people. I will put the offer up below. 1.Admin Rank Jagex dosnt listen to us heres a video ive uploaded recently about Jagex needing to listen to us! [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gj11_BGe2ts[/youtube]
if you help you will get admin rank in the game :) please comment below if you want to join the project Current Staff Main Owner=Mod Clayton Developer/Admin= Developer/Admin= Developer/Admin= We are currently hiring 3 Developers and thats all we will be hiring at the moment. [url=http://www.the2006project.webs.com]the2006project[/url]

item.title: The2006project Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @KingClay KingClay
item.description:
@KingClay wrote:

Hey guys im starting a 2006 server called the2006project but i need some people who could help me code the server. Heres the server post that i made in the server advertisment

Today ive decided people are looking for 2006 rsps servers than why not make one! Im in need of developers if you would like to be a developer please leave a comment below. There will be some updates adding in items that arent in 2006 Don't worry these will not get out as they are only for staff members. If you do not like the updates post a comment and i will remove them! Thanks

-Clayton

[b][center][size=12pt]The2006Project[/size][/center]

[b][center]Staff[/center]

Hello guys this is the staff list. I will be doing this as a under cover project so my orignal staff will not be on board here!

Main Owner=Mod Clayton

Thats all as i said earlier im soloing this project but also as i said earlier im in need of a developer!

[center]Project Plans[/center]
[]Auto Cache Downloader
[]Webclient
[]Prices
[]Custom Shops

[b][center][SIZE=14pt]Custom’s[/SIZE][/center]
We will be adding some custom weapons,items and shields into the game. WE WILL NEVER UPDATE THE CLIENT LOOKS OR GRAPHICS! If you do not like any of the stuff we are updating please leave a comment saying so or i will never know!

Weapons
[]Chaotic Rapier (Fun Weapon)
[]Dice Bags

[size=10pt]Cosmetic items[/size]
[]Sky Blue Party Hat
[]Neon Party Hat
[]Rainbow Party Hat
[]Purple H’ween Mask

[size=10pt]Shields[/size]
Most of this will be for Staff members only so don’t worry about this.
[]Spirit Shields (Admins)
[]Chaotic,farseer and eagle-eye shields (Owners)
[]Bandos Kiteshield (Donator +)
[]

[b][center][size=14pt]Developer Needed![/size][/center]

This is a big project but i can’t do it on my own i need your guys help. Im in need of a developer who can partner with me and get this server running for the rest of our people. I will put the offer up below.

1.Admin Rank

Jagex dosnt listen to us heres a video ive uploaded recently about Jagex needing to listen to us!

[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gj11_BGe2ts[/youtube]

if you help you will get admin rank in the game

please comment below if you want to join the project

Current Staff

Main Owner=Mod Clayton

Developer/Admin=

Developer/Admin=

Developer/Admin=

We are currently hiring 3 Developers and thats all we will be hiring at the moment.

the2006project

Read full topic
